alert.note: Alert for Glacier (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:32PM MDT until August 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Glacier County in north central Montana... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 532 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North Browning, or 24 miles west of Cut Bank, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Browning and South Browning. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
